paragraph: In a range of activities, including game drives, boat safaris, bird watching, and nature walks.
The Bisoke hike is a popular mountain trek in Rwanda, located in theVolcanoes National Park . It is one of the most challenging hikes in the park.
A trip to Lake Kivu can be a truly unique and memorable experience.
